workshoptitle: Simple Oracle Document Access (SODA) using Python

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Development environment preparation
tutorials.description: Provision Oracle Cloud Infrastructure basic resources.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Build Python application using SODA and JSON
tutorials.description: This lab shows how easy it is to build a simple Python application that uses JSON documents from MongoDB Cloud Atlas and Oracle Autonomous JSON Database using SODA APIs.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
